006package tagalong.subsystems.micro;
007
008import com.ctre.phoenix6.configs.CANcoderConfiguration;
009import com.ctre.phoenix6.configs.FeedbackConfigs;
010import com.ctre.phoenix6.hardware.CANcoder;
011import com.ctre.phoenix6.hardware.TalonFX;
012import com.ctre.phoenix6.signals.FeedbackSensorSourceValue;
013import com.ctre.phoenix6.sim.CANcoderSimState;
014import edu.wpi.first.math.controller.ArmFeedforward;
015import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Rotation2d;
016import edu.wpi.first.math.trajectory.TrapezoidProfile;
017import edu.wpi.first.math.util.Units;
018import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.IterativeRobotBase;
019import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.RobotController;
020import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation.BatterySim;
021import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation.RoboRioSim;
022import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation.SingleJointedArmSim;
023import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard.Mechanism2d;
024import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard.MechanismLigament2d;
025import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard.SmartDashboard;
026import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.util.Color8Bit;
027import tagalong.TagalongConfiguration;
028import tagalong.math.AlgebraicUtils;
029import tagalong.subsystems.micro.confs.PivotConf;
030
031/**
032 * Pivot microsystem
033 */
034public class Pivot extends Microsystem {
035  /**
036   * Configuration for the pivot
037   */
038  public final PivotConf _pivotConf;
039
040  /* -------- Hardware: motors and sensors -------- */
041  /**
042   * CANcoder device
043   */
044  public CANcoder _pivotCancoder;
045  /**
046   * Configuration for the CANcoder
047   */
048  protected CANcoderConfiguration _pivotCancoderConfiguration;
049
050  /* -------- Control: states and constants -------- */
051  /**
052   * Gear ratio from the motor to encoder (conversion g.t. 1 represents a reduction)
053   */
054  protected double _motorToEncoderRatio;
055  /**
056   * Gear ratio from the encoder to pivot mechanism (conversion g.t. 1 represents a reduction)
057   */
058  protected double _encoderToPivotRatio;
059  /**
060   * Default lower tolerance of the pivot in rotations,
061   * Default upper tolerance of the pivot in rotations
062   */
063  public final double _defaultPivotLowerToleranceRot, _defaultPivotUpperToleranceRot;
064  /**
065   * Absolute range of pivot movement in rotations
066   */
067  public final double _absoluteRangeRot;
068  /**
069   * Minimum height of the pivot in rotations,
070   * Maximum height of the pivot in rotations
071   */
072  public final double _minPositionRot, _maxPositionRot;
073  /**
074   * Maximum velocity of the pivot in rollers per second,
075   * Maximum acceleration of the rollers in rotations per second squared
076   */
077  public final double _maxVelocityRPS, _maxAccelerationRPS2;
078  /**
079   * Offset value for the target position
080   */
081  public final double _profileTargetOffset;
082
083  /* -------- Control: controllers and utilities -------- */
084  /**
085   * Feedforward model for the pivot
086   */
087  protected ArmFeedforward _pivotFF;
088  /**
089   * Offset value for the target position
090   */
091  public final double _ffCenterOfMassOffsetRad;
092  /**
093   * Positional values for safe clamp logic
094   */
095  private double[] _values;
096  /**
097   * IDs for safe clamp switch case
098   */
099  private int[] _ids;
100
101  /* -------- Sim -------- */
102  /**
103   * Single jointed arm simulation for the pivot
104   */
105  protected SingleJointedArmSim _pivotSim;
106  /**
107   * CANcoder simulation
108   */
109  protected CANcoderSimState _pivotCancoderSim;
110  /**
111   * Position of the simulated pivot in rotations
112   */
113  protected double _simRotations;
114  /**
115   * Velocity of the simulated pivot in rotations per second
116   */
117  protected double _simVeloRPS;
118  /**
119   * Acceleration of the simulated pivot in rotations per second squared
120   */
121  protected double _simAccelRPS2;
122  /**
123   * Simulated arm of the pivot
124   */
125  protected MechanismLigament2d _ligament;
126
127  /**
128   * Constructs a pivot microsystem with the below configurations
129   *
130   * @param conf Configurations for the pivot
131   */
132  public Pivot(PivotConf conf) {
133    super(conf);
134    _pivotConf = conf;
135
136    if (_configuredMicrosystemDisable) {
137      _defaultPivotLowerToleranceRot = 0.0;
138      _defaultPivotUpperToleranceRot = 0.0;
139      _absoluteRangeRot = 0.0;
140      _minPositionRot = 0.0;
141      _maxPositionRot = 0.0;
142      _maxVelocityRPS = 0.0;
143      _maxAccelerationRPS2 = 0.0;
144      _profileTargetOffset = 0.0;
145      _ffCenterOfMassOffsetRad = 0.0;
146      return;
147    }
148
149    _pivotCancoder = new CANcoder(_pivotConf.encoderDeviceID, _pivotConf.encoderCanBus);
150
151    _pivotFF = _pivotConf.feedForward;
152    _defaultPivotLowerToleranceRot = _pivotConf.defaultLowerTolerance;
153    _defaultPivotUpperToleranceRot = _pivotConf.defaultUpperTolerance;
154    _minPositionRot = _pivotConf.rotationalMin;
155    _maxPositionRot = _pivotConf.rotationalMax;
156    _absoluteRangeRot = _maxPositionRot - _minPositionRot;
157    _maxVelocityRPS = _pivotConf.trapezoidalLimitsVelocity;
158    _maxAccelerationRPS2 = _pivotConf.trapezoidalLimitsAcceleration;
159    _profileTargetOffset = _pivotConf.profileOffsetValue;
160    _ffCenterOfMassOffsetRad = _pivotConf.ffOffsetValue;
161
162    _trapProfile = new TrapezoidProfile(_pivotConf.trapezoidalLimits);
163    _curState.position = getPivotPosition();
164
165    _motorToEncoderRatio = _pivotConf.motorToEncoderRatio;
166    _encoderToPivotRatio = _pivotConf.encoderToPivotRatio;
167
168    _pivotCancoderConfiguration = _pivotConf.encoderConfig;
169
170    double minAbs = AlgebraicUtils.cppMod(_minPositionRot, 1.0);
171    double maxAbs = AlgebraicUtils.cppMod(_maxPositionRot, 1.0);
172    double halfUnusedRange = (_absoluteRangeRot) / 2.0;
173    double midUnused = maxAbs + halfUnusedRange;
174
175    if (midUnused > 1.0) {
176      _values = new double[] {midUnused - 1.0, minAbs, maxAbs, 1.0};
177      _ids = new int[] {2, 0, 1, 2};
178    } else if (_minPositionRot > 0.0) {
179      _values = new double[] {minAbs, maxAbs, midUnused, 1.0};
180      _ids = new int[] {0, 1, 2, 0};
181    } else {
182      _values = new double[] {maxAbs, midUnused, minAbs, 1.0};
183      _ids = new int[] {1, 2, 0, 1};
184    }
185    if (IterativeRobotBase.isReal()) {
186      int count = 0;
187      // while (!_primaryMotor.isAlive() && count <= 1000) {
188      // System.out.println(_pivotConf.name + " not alive " + (count++));
189      // }
190      if (count >= 1000) {
191        System.out.println(_pivotConf.name + " failed to initialize!");
192      }
193    }
194
195    configCancoder();
196    configAllDevices();
197    configMotor();
198  }
199
200  /**
201   * Periodic update function
202   */
203  public void periodic() {
204    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
205      return;
206    } else if (motorResetConfig()) {
207      setPivotProfile(getPivotPosition(), 0.0);
208      _primaryMotor.set(0.0);
209    } else if (_isFFTuningMicro && _trapProfile.isFinished(_profileTimer.get())) {
210      _primaryMotor.setControl(_requestedPositionVoltage.withFeedForward(
211          _pivotFF.ks + _pivotFF.ks * Math.cos(getFFPositionRad())
212      ));
213    }
214
215    if (_followProfile) {
216      followLastProfile();
217    }
218  }
219
220  /**
221   * Gets the primary motor of the pivot
222   *
223   * @return primary motor
224   */
225  public TalonFX getMotor() {
226    return _primaryMotor;
227  }
228
229  /**
230   * Executes logic for when the robot is first enabled
231   */
232  @Override
233  public void onEnable() {
234    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
235      return;
236    }
237    super.onEnable();
238
239    if (_isFFTuningMicro) {
240      _pivotFF = new ArmFeedforward(
241          _KSEntry.getDouble(_pivotFF.ks),
242          _KGEntry.getDouble(_pivotFF.kg),
243          _KVEntry.getDouble(_pivotFF.kv),
244          _KAEntry.getDouble(_pivotFF.ka)
245      );
246      _primaryMotor.setControl(_requestedPositionVoltage.withFeedForward(
247          _pivotFF.ks + _pivotFF.ks * Math.cos(getFFPositionRad())
248      ));
249    }
250  }
251
252  @Override
253  public void onDisable() {
254    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
255      return;
256    }
257
258    super.onDisable();
259  }
260
261  /**
262   * Updates shuffleboard with the pivot's current position and velocity
263   */
264  @Override
265  public void updateShuffleboard() {
266    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
267      return;
268    }
269    if (_isShuffleboardMicro) {
270      _currentPositionEntry.setDouble(getPivotPosition());
271      _currentVelocityEntry.setDouble(getPivotVelocity());
272    }
273  }
274
275  /**
276   * Converts motor rotations to rotations of the pivot mechanism
277   *
278   * @param motorRot Position of the motor in rotations
279   * @return Position of the pivot in rotations
280   */
281  public double motorToPivotRot(double motorRot) {
282    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
283      return 0.0;
284    }
285    // FUTURE DEV: modify to allow for unfused or not 1:1 with pivot
286    return motorRot / (_encoderToPivotRatio * _motorToEncoderRatio);
287  }
288
289  /**
290   * Converts rotations of the pivot mechanism to motor rotations
291   *
292   * @param pivotRot Position of the pivot in rotations
293   * @return Position of the motor in rotations
294   */
295  public double pivotRotToMotor(double pivotRot) {
296    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
297      return 0.0;
298    }
299    // FUTURE DEV: modify to allow for unfused or not 1:1 with pivot
300    return pivotRot * (_encoderToPivotRatio * _motorToEncoderRatio);
301  }
302
303  /**
304   * Configure shuffleboard for the pivot
305   */
306  @Override
307  public void configShuffleboard() {
308    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
309      return;
310    }
311    super.configShuffleboard();
312  }
313
314  /**
315   * Calculates the next state according to the trapezoidal profile and requests the pivot motor(s)
316   * to arrive at the next position with feedforward
317   */
318  public void followLastProfile() {
319    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
320      return;
321    }
322
323    TrapezoidProfile.State nextState =
324        _trapProfile.calculate(TagalongConfiguration.LOOP_PERIOD_S, _curState, _goalState);
325    // FUTURE DEV: modify to allow for unfused or not 1:1 with pivot, convert to motor units
326    _primaryMotor.setControl(
327        _requestedPositionVoltage
328            .withPosition(nextState.position)
329            // FeedForward must know the pivot rotation and other arguments in radians
330            .withFeedForward(_pivotFF.calculate(
331                getFFPositionRad(),
332                Units.rotationsToRadians(nextState.velocity),
333                Units.rotationsToRadians(
334                    (nextState.velocity - _curState.velocity) / TagalongConfiguration.LOOP_PERIOD_S
335                )
336            ))
337    );
338
339    if (_isShuffleboardMicro) {
340      _targetPositionEntry.setDouble(nextState.position);
341      _targetVelocityEntry.setDouble(nextState.velocity);
342    }
343
344    _curState = nextState;
345  }
346
347  /**
348   * Gets the position offset for feedforward (to account for a shifted center of
349   * mass) in rotations
350   *
351   * @return offset position in rotations
352   */
353  public double getFFPositionRad() {
354    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
355      return 0.0;
356    }
357
358    // FUTURE DEV: modify to allow for unfused or not 1:1 with pivot
359    return Units.rotationsToRadians(_pivotCancoder.getPosition().getValueAsDouble())
360        + _ffCenterOfMassOffsetRad;
361  }
362
363  /**
364   * Sets the power of the primary motor
365   *
366   * @param power desired power
367   */
368  public void setPivotPower(double power) {
369    setPrimaryPower(power);
370  }
371
372  /**
373   * Gets the power of the primary motor
374   *
375   * @return the current power
376   */
377  public double getPivotPower() {
378    return getPrimaryMotorPower();
379  }
380
381  /**
382   * Sets the velocity of the pivot in RPS
383   *
384   * @param rps Desired velocity in rotations per second
385   * @param withFF with feedforward
386   */
387  public void setPivotVelocity(double rps, boolean withFF) {
388    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
389      return;
390    }
391    setFollowProfile(false);
392
393    _primaryMotor.setControl(
394        _requestedVelocityVoltage
395            // FUTURE DEV: modify to allow for unfused or not 1:1 with pivot
396            .withVelocity(rps)
397            .withFeedForward(
398                withFF ? _pivotFF.calculate(getFFPositionRad(), Units.rotationsToRadians(rps), 0.0)
399                       : 0.0
400            )
401    );
402  }
403
404  /**
405   * Gets the current position of the pivot in rotations
406   *
407   * @return the position of the primary motor which is the same as the position of the pivot when
408   *     they are fused
409   */
410  public double getPivotPosition() {
411    return getPrimaryMotorPosition();
412  }
413
414  /**
415   * Gets the current velocity of the pivot in rotations per second
416   *
417   * @return the velocity of the primary motor which is the same as the velocity of the pivot when
418   *     they are fused
419   */
420  public double getPivotVelocity() {
421    return getPrimaryMotorVelocity();
422  }
423
424  /**
425   * Returns the new pivot angle in the closest scope of the reference pivot angle
426   *
427   * @param scopeReferenceRot reference angle in rotations
428   * @param newAngleRot       angle to be scoped in rotations
429   * @return scoped newAngleRot
430   */
431  public double placePivotInClosestRot(double scopeReferenceRot, double newAngleRot) {
432    return AlgebraicUtils.placeInScopeRot(scopeReferenceRot, newAngleRot);
433  }
434
435  /**
436   * Creates a new trapezoidal profile for the pivot to follow
437   *
438   * @param goalPositionRot goal position in rotations
439   * @param goalVelocityRPS goal velocity in rotations per second
440   */
441  public void setPivotProfile(double goalPositionRot, double goalVelocityRPS) {
442    setPivotProfile(goalPositionRot, goalVelocityRPS, _maxVelocityRPS);
443  }
444
445  /**
446   * Creates a new trapezoidal profile for the pivot to follow
447   *
448   * @param goalPositionRot goal position in rotations
449   * @param goalVelocityRPS goal velocity in rotations per second
450   * @param maxVelocityRPS  maximum velocity in rotations per second
451   */
452  public void setPivotProfile(
453      double goalPositionRot, double goalVelocityRPS, double maxVelocityRPS
454  ) {
455    setPivotProfile(goalPositionRot, goalVelocityRPS, maxVelocityRPS, _maxAccelerationRPS2);
456  }
457
458  /**
459   * Creates a new trapezoidal profile for the pivot to follow
460   *
461   * @param goalPositionRot     goal position in rotations
462   * @param goalVelocityRPS     goal velocity in rotations per second
463   * @param maxVelocityRPS      maximum velocity in rotations per second
464   * @param maxAccelerationRPS2 maximum acceleration in rotations per second squared
465   */
466  public void setPivotProfile(
467      double goalPositionRot,
468      double goalVelocityRPS,
469      double maxVelocityRPS,
470      double maxAccelerationRPS2
471  ) {
472    setPivotProfile(goalPositionRot, goalVelocityRPS, maxVelocityRPS, maxAccelerationRPS2, true);
473  }
474
475  /**
476   * Creates a new trapezoidal profile for the pivot to follow
477   *
478   * @param goalPositionRot     goal position in rotations
479   * @param goalVelocityRPS     goal velocity in rotations per second
480   * @param maxVelocityRPS      maximum velocity in rotations per second
481   * @param maxAccelerationRPS2 maximum acceleration in rotations per second squared
482   * @param setCurrentState     True if the profiles current state should base itself off sensor
483   *     values rather than continue from the existing state
484   */
485  public void setPivotProfile(
486      double goalPositionRot,
487      double goalVelocityRPS,
488      double maxVelocityRPS,
489      double maxAccelerationRPS2,
490      boolean setCurrentState
491  ) {
492    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
493      return;
494    }
495    setFollowProfile(false);
496
497    if (setCurrentState) {
498      _curState.position = getPivotPosition();
499      _curState.velocity = getPivotVelocity();
500    }
501
502    _goalState.velocity = goalVelocityRPS;
503    _goalState.position = (_absoluteRangeRot < 1.0 ? absoluteClamp(goalPositionRot)
504                                                   : clampPivotPosition(goalPositionRot))
505        + _profileTargetOffset;
506
507    _trapProfile = new TrapezoidProfile(
508        (maxVelocityRPS >= _maxVelocityRPS || maxAccelerationRPS2 >= _maxAccelerationRPS2)
509            ? _pivotConf.trapezoidalLimits
510            : new TrapezoidProfile.Constraints(maxVelocityRPS, maxAccelerationRPS2)
511    );
512
513    _profileTimer.restart();
514  }
515
516  /**
517   * Configures the CANcoder according to specified configuration
518   */
519  private void configCancoder() {
520    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
521      return;
522    }
523
524    _pivotCancoder.getConfigurator().apply(_pivotCancoderConfiguration);
525  }
526
527  /**
528   * Configures the motor according to specified configuration
529   */
530  private void configMotor() {
531    for (int i = 0; i < _conf.numMotors; i++) {
532      _conf.motorConfig[i].withFeedback(
533          new FeedbackConfigs()
534              .withFeedbackSensorSource(FeedbackSensorSourceValue.FusedCANcoder)
535              .withFeedbackRemoteSensorID(_pivotCancoder.getDeviceID())
536              .withRotorToSensorRatio(_pivotConf.motorToEncoderRatio)
537              .withSensorToMechanismRatio(_pivotConf.encoderToPivotRatio)
538      );
539      _allMotors[i].getConfigurator().apply(_conf.motorConfig[i]);
540    }
541  }
542
543  /**
544   * Clamps the goal pivot position to be within rotational limits
545   *
546   * @param target goal position in rotations
547   * @return clamped goal position in rotations
548   */
549  public double clampPivotPosition(double target) {
550    return AlgebraicUtils.clamp(target, _minPositionRot, _maxPositionRot);
551  }
552
553  /**
554   * Resets devices if resets have occurred
555   */
556  @Override
557  public boolean motorResetConfig() {
558    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
559      return false;
560    }
561    if (_primaryMotor.hasResetOccurred()) {
562      configAllDevices();
563      configMotor();
564      return true;
565    }
566    if (_pivotCancoder.hasResetOccurred()) {
567      configCancoder();
568      return true;
569    }
570    return false;
571  }
572
573  /**
574   * Initializes the pivot simulation
575   */
576  public void simulationInit() {
577    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
578      return;
579    }
580
581    _pivotSim = new SingleJointedArmSim(
582        _pivotConf.motorTypes[0].simSupplier.apply(_pivotConf.numMotors),
583        _motorToEncoderRatio * _encoderToPivotRatio,
584        _pivotConf.pivotMOI,
585        _pivotConf.pivotLengthM,
586        Units.degreesToRadians(_minPositionRot),
587        Units.degreesToRadians(_maxPositionRot),
588        true,
589        Units.degreesToRadians(0)
590    );
591
592    _mechanism = new Mechanism2d(50, 50);
593    SmartDashboard.putData("SIM: " + _pivotConf.name, _mechanism);
594
595    _root = _mechanism.getRoot(_pivotConf.name, 25, 25);
596    _ligament = new MechanismLigament2d(_pivotConf.name, 10.0, 180);
597    _root.append(_ligament);
598    _ligament.setColor(new Color8Bit(255, 255, 255));
599
600    _pivotCancoderSim = _pivotCancoder.getSimState();
601    _primaryMotorSim = _primaryMotor.getSimState();
602  }
603
604  /**
605   * Runs the pivot simulation--sets motor and cancoder simulation fields and updates the visual
606   */
607  @Override
608  public void simulationPeriodic() {
609    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
610      return;
611    }
612    _pivotSim.setInputVoltage(_primaryMotor.get() * RobotController.getBatteryVoltage());
613    _pivotSim.update(TagalongConfiguration.LOOP_PERIOD_S);
614
615    // FUTURE DEV: modify to allow for unfused or not 1:1 with pivot
616    double prevSimVelo = _simVeloRPS;
617    _simVeloRPS = Units.radiansToRotations(_pivotSim.getVelocityRadPerSec());
618    _simRotations += Units.radiansToRotations(_pivotSim.getAngleRads());
619    _simAccelRPS2 = (_simVeloRPS - prevSimVelo) / TagalongConfiguration.LOOP_PERIOD_S;
620
621    _ligament.setAngle(Rotation2d.fromRadians(_pivotSim.getAngleRads()));
622
623    _pivotCancoderSim.setRawPosition(Units.radiansToRotations(_pivotSim.getAngleRads()));
624    _pivotCancoderSim.setVelocity(_simVeloRPS);
625    _pivotCancoderSim.setSupplyVoltage(RobotController.getBatteryVoltage());
626
627    _primaryMotorSim.setRawRotorPosition(pivotRotToMotor(_simRotations));
628    _primaryMotorSim.setRotorVelocity(pivotRotToMotor(_simVeloRPS));
629    _primaryMotorSim.setRotorAcceleration(pivotRotToMotor(_simAccelRPS2));
630    _primaryMotorSim.setSupplyVoltage(RobotController.getBatteryVoltage());
631
632    RoboRioSim.setVInVoltage(
633        BatterySim.calculateDefaultBatteryLoadedVoltage(_pivotSim.getCurrentDrawAmps())
634    );
635  }
636
637  /**
638   * Checks whether or not it's safe for the pivot to move
639   *
640   * @return whether or not it's safe to move
641   */
642  public boolean isSafeToMove() {
643    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
644      return true;
645    }
646    return true;
647  }
648
649  /**
650   * Directs the pivot to its maximum position, current goal position, or minimum position
651   *
652   * @param value goal position
653   * @return redirected goal position
654   */
655  public double absoluteClamp(double value) {
656    double abs = AlgebraicUtils.cppMod(value, 1.0);
657    int i = 0;
658    while (abs >= _values[i] && i < _values.length) {
659      i++;
660    }
661    switch (_ids[i]) {
662      case 2:
663        return _maxPositionRot;
664      case 1:
665        return abs;
666      case 0:
667      default:
668        return _minPositionRot;
669    }
670  }
671
672  /**
673   * Bounds checking function that uses the current pivot position
674   *
675   * @param lowerBound Minimum of acceptable range
676   * @param upperBound Maximum of acceptable range
677   * @return If the current position is greater than or equal to the lower bound and less than or
678   *     equal to the upper bound
679   */
680  public boolean isPivotInTolerance(double lowerBound, double upperBound) {
681    if (_isMicrosystemDisabled) {
682      return true;
683    }
684    return AlgebraicUtils.inTolerance(getPivotPosition(), lowerBound, upperBound);
685  }
686
687  /**
688   * Bounds checking function that uses the absolute current pivot position (modulo one rotation)
689   *
690   * @param lowerBound Minimum of acceptable range
691   * @param upperBound Maximum of acceptable range
692   * @return If the absolute current position is in absolute acceptable range
693   */
694  public boolean isPivotInAbsoluteTolerance(double lowerBound, double upperBound) {
695    double position = AlgebraicUtils.cppMod(getPivotPosition(), 1.0);
696    lowerBound = AlgebraicUtils.cppMod(lowerBound, 1.0);
697    upperBound = AlgebraicUtils.cppMod(upperBound, 1.0);
698    return _isMicrosystemDisabled || position >= 0
699        ? AlgebraicUtils.inTolerance(position, lowerBound, upperBound)
700        : AlgebraicUtils.inTolerance(position + 1.0, lowerBound, upperBound);
701  }
702
703  @Override
704  public void holdCurrentPosition() {
705    setPivotProfile(getPivotPosition(), 0.0);
706    setFollowProfile(true);
707  }
708}
